channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington learns that seagulls love chips in 'Paddington vs the Seagulls', and in 'Paddington and the Light House', the lighthouse light is broken - can Paddington help save a boat at sea? (S3, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington seeks Captain Green Beard's loot in 'Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt', then in 'Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper', everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition! (S3, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Hot Dry Day; Folk Music Band: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Calling Kylie; House Rules: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Brave Bunnies
channel.desc: Hat Parade: When the kids see Pa's latest invention, the Hat-O-Matic, produce a plain sunhat for Ma, they ask him to make identical ones for them. (S1, ep 50).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Brave Bunnies
channel.desc: A Foggy Fable: Bop and Boo awaken on the plains to find their camp shrouded in fog. It's so thick, Boo can't find her ball! Their fox friend imagines the fog is a magical mist. (S1, ep 42).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Brave Bunnies
channel.desc: Juggle Me This: While visiting the jungle, Bop and Boo meet with their monkey friends, Chika and Chuka. The monkey friends' curiosity makes it difficult for them to play together. (S1, ep 44).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora shows the twins a baila folklorico dancer who comes to life in 'Tiny Dancer', then in 'The Sleepy Sun', the sun won't set because it can't fall asleep! Dora needs to find Pillow Cloud. (S1, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Boots gets Tico a Guayabera shirt in 'A Guayabera For Tico', then in 'Falling Estrella's', Dora returns three missing stars to their constellation. (S1, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Beach N Bush: Gemma and Spyke take cadets on an adventure to decide if the beach or bush is best.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Whale Song Spectacular: The cadets throw a whale concert to attract baby whales for Gemma.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Fluffly Flufferton: She's glittery. She's glam. She's Fluffy Flufferton, the most a-meowzing pop star. Join the gang as they help her shake things up before a big concert. (S2, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora throws a super-secret surprise party in 'Abuela's Quinceanera', then in 'Story Time', Dora's friend Coco doesn't have a story, so they go to the Tall Tale Tree in search of one! (S3, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Chef makes some delicious cat food for Azrael in 'Smurfalicious Catfood', and then in 'Waffle Thief', Dwayne loves Lily's waffles and keeps wanting more. (S4, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: A bad haircut threatens to ruin more than just Steve's good looks in 'Bad Hair Day!', then in 'Kanga Ruiner!', the team travels to Australia to stop a giant Mecha-Roo. (S1, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: The Stinkwell skunks help the duo find 'The Disappearing Dung Ball', then in 'The Search for the Spotted Frog', Nature ranger Wally Bunker joins Sam and Kit to look for a pet frog. (S1, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Boots needs to rescue Isa on their 'Friendaversary Adventure', then in 'Swiper's Birthday Surprise', Dora brings a gift to a Swiper's party and must stop him from swiping his own gift! (S1, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: We meet Grace and her long-haired Dachshund, Teddy, as they join The Real Pup Squad! The local caf? hasn't received its food delivery.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Larenzo Lion: Today, Mummy Pig and Peppa are at the zoo and meet Larenzo Lion who lives there! Larenzo shows Peppa his toy zoo, but he keeps misplacing his wooden animals in his two bedrooms.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Dinosaurs Alive!: The playgroup is visiting the zoo today. Mr Lion then shows them a giant lizard! The children all believe it's a dinosaur.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr Cat's Cafe: Peppa is on a play date with Candy Cat at Mr Cat's Cafe. Candy show Mr Cat the drawings they've done of everyone, and he hangs them up for everyone to see.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Cushion Den; Staying Up Late: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: New TV; Indoor Adventure: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Camping Out: Holly is going on a camping trip with Ben and his mum and dad, but they are soon joined by annoying Mr Gnome, who is always hungry and sings silly songs.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Fruit Harvest: It is harvest day. The Elves and fairies enlist the help of Mr Gnome in picking blackberries. If only they could stop him from eating them all.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Games: Ben is in training for the elf games, Holly wants to join in but the rules state there is absolutely no flying or magic allowed. Ben gives Holly a chance to join in without using magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Dinner Party: Snooty King and Queen Marigold invite themselves round for dinner to King and Queen Thistle's castle to sample Nanny Plum's cooking. Nanny tries hard to cook special modern food.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Hot Dry Day; Folk Music Band: Two episodes.

channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Dinner Party: Snooty King and Queen Marigold invite themselves round for dinner to King and Queen Thistle's castle to sample Nanny Plum's cooking. Nanny tries hard to cook special modern food.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Uncle Gaston: Three baby ladybirds, Amber, Emerald and Keith have come to stay at Uncle Gaston's for the day. The baby ladybirds are exhausting! So Ben and Holly help Gaston to keep them entertained.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nanny Plum's Lesson: Nanny Plum is teaching the fairy girls some important fairy rules when she is blown away, trapped in a tree, dropped in a stream and covered in mud.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa's Diary; Playing Golf: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Creepy Crawly Safari; Hoops: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Park; The Lifeboat: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Lucky Hamper; Jelly: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Woodpecker: King Thistle is bored and takes up the hobby of bird watching. Using his magic bird book, the King is pleased when another creature makes a nest in the Royal Castle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Plumbing: The bath tap at the Little Castle is dripping, so the elf plumber is called. It's a bigger job than first expected, but with King and Queen Marigolds coming round, there's not much time.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups build the first hotel in town in 'The Crew Builds A Hotel', and then in 'The Crew Builds A Hiking Trail', the crew saves a duck birthday party. (S2, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Something's funky in the food at a jungle resort in 'The Puzzle of the Poisonous Leaves', and in 'The Mystery of the Missing Hare', Snowshoe hares need to find a missing camper. (S1, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora and Boots get a baby back to its mama in 'The Little Axolotl', and in 'Bubble Trouble', Dora must save the Big Red Chicken who floats away in a bubble right before the big talent show. (S1, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: True Fairy Friends: A Fairy Fly is coming to stay in the Fairy Tail Garden! But before they arrive, the Gabby Cats have to show they are true friends by being kind, helpful and welcoming. (S3, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Recorders; Miss Rabbit's Relaxation Class: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Parking Ticket; Funny Music: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Fun and Games: Ben and Holly are having fun playing in the meadow. Holly gets frustrated when Ben uses his elf skills to win all the games. Ben gets frustrated when Holly uses her magic skills.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Lucy's School: Holly and Ben spend a day at Lucy's school, whilst trying not to be spotted by Lucy's teacher, Miss Cookie.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle Is Not Well: King Thistle has a cold and needs medicine. Nanny Plum, Holly and Ben have fun collecting the ingredients for a magic potion to make him better.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Lost Egg: Ben, Holly and Gaston the Ladybird find a large egg in the meadow. A tiny chick hatches from the egg and the children must find the mummy bird.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Tiny Chef Show
channel.desc: Chef makes sandwiches for the Stump Band in 'Peanut Butter & Jelly', then in 'Potato Skins', Chef celebrates Henry's favourite holiday, Potato Day. (S2, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: An old prospector triggers a gold rush in Adventure Bay in 'Pups Save a Goldrush', and then in 'Pups Save the Paw Patroller', Mayor Humdinger and the Kit-tastrophe Crew drives the Paw Patroller away.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Wildflower Wood: Madame Gazelle and Mr Bull lead the children to the wildflower wood to learn all about flowers. The children enjoy identifying Wild Garlic, Bluebells and even an orchid! (S7, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Sunny Day Games: Peppa and George are playing at their grandparent's garden on a very hot day but they don't have a paddling pool! (S7, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Magic Trick; Jumping Stick: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Chloe's Birthday Party: At Chloe's party, the children and grownups struggle to finish the obstacle course to reach the prize. George is the last to try and finds the birthday cake! (S7, ep 27).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Racquet Games: Miss Rabbit gives Peppa and friends a tennis lesson, but the tennis balls get everywhere! So, the children play badminton instead and it's a lot easier. (S7, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Broken Party Bus; Living Above the Shops: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Roof Top Garden; Moving In: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Everybody Sleepover!: Peppa and all her friends are having a sleepover - different friends in each of the apartments in the high street. So they play hide and seek across all the rooms! (S7, ep 33).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Caravan Friends: After Peppa and family visit a tourist spot with her new friend Birgit Bear, the caravan unhooks from the car! Luckily, the bear family stop it just in time. (S7, ep 26).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Royal Golf Course: A mole disturbs King Thistle's Golf Course, so a gnome is enlisted to help drive it away. Soon though the gnome is turning the King's golf course into a crazy golf course.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Lucy's Picnic: On a tour of the Elf Factory, the Elf and Fairy children learn about recycling and see how rubbish is re-used. When the factory runs out of material, they set out to find some more.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Granny and Granpapa: A magical card arrives in the Little Kingdom, inviting everyone to a party at Granny and Granpapa Thistle's castle in the clouds.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Wise Old Elf teaches the elf children how to tell the time using a watch, while Nanny Plum would much rather use a dandelion clock to teach the fairy children.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: When Peppa gets Teddy dirty jumping in muddy puddles, she goes to The Doll Hospital.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Wendy Wolf's birthday is here and she has invited Peppa and friends around for a party.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: George has a new hat and Mummy Pig is determined that George doesn't get it muddy when visiting Grandpa and Granny Pig.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It's Captain Daddy Dog's birthday and Mummy Dog surprises him with the gift of a boat trip, which isn't quite what he had expected.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: Who is Paddington's Special visitor that Jonathan and Judy have helped come from afar? // It's the last night of Hanukkah and Mr Gruber's Hanukkiah breaks before he can light the final candle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The Windsor Ruby is missing in 'Paddington's Adventure Club Cracks The Case!', then in 'Paddington And Aunt Lucy's Special Recipe', the Browns set up a takeaway, but it's hard work.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: A game between England and Peru causes 'Paddington's Football Dilemma', then in 'Paddington Has To Say Goodbye', it's time for Aunt Lucy to go home, but there's still one more adventure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Uncle Otis is hurling down Jake's Mountain in a runaway mine car! Ryder and the Pups need to rescue him before it crashes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: Some pufflings get lost in 'Paddington's Puffling Rescue', then in 'Paddington Goes Under The Sea', Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonathan and Judy - but where is her necklace.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
